dmp.title: Data Management Plan -- Correlating World Conflict with Local Economy Growth

project.title: Correlating World Conflict with Local Economy Growth
project.description:
For the average student, the `Uppsala Conflict Data Program <https://ucdp.uu.se/> <https://ucdp.uu.se/>`_ offers a fascinating periscope onto the conflicts of the world. Together with economic figures as collected by `Statistik Austria <https://www.statistik.at> <https://www.statistik.at>`_, the local economic impact of world-wide conflict is calculated.
WARNING: While this student is fairly confident regarding the numerical quality of the calculations, any conclusions have to be regarded as having worse-than-questionable statistical validity.

dataset.title: Economic figures of Austria, 1976 to 2020
dataset.description:
Economical data on the country 'AUSTRIA' as calculated by the state-owned and state-sponsored entity 'STATISTIK AUSTRIA'.
Data comprises such values as the gross domestic product, and related figures.
Data contains one value of each parameter per year, in the extent from 1976 to 2020.
Data constitutes three files, as downloaded by the publisher from the creator's homepage.
volkswirtschaftliche_gesamtrechnung_hauptgroessen.xlsx
    the most recent data, up to 2020. the data 2016 to 2020 is
    only preliminary.

volkswirtschaftliche_gesamtrechnungen_1976-2007.pdf
    austria economic figures from 1976 to 2007 (final numbers).

volkswirtschaftliche_gesamtrechnungen_1995_-_2018.pdf
    austria economic figures from 1995 to 2018, final numbers,
    except 2016 to 2018 which are preliminiary numbers.

distribution.title: `sna-at` data set within the public project github repository
distribution.description:
Re-publishing of the original dataset in unaltered form via public github git repository.
The distribution consists of multiple files, exactly in the form the data was acquired from the source.

distribution.title: `sna-at` data set within the public project github repository
distribution.description:
Publishing of the original dataset in unaltered form via public github git repository.
The distribution consists of multiple files, exactly in the form the data was acquired from the source.

host.title: Pogner Family IT System
host.backup_type: rotating magnetic disks, on-site and off-site
host.storage_type: active checksum file system, on raid5, on rotating magnetic disks

data_quality_assurance: file naming convention: store files exactly as named by the data source
data quality checklist items included in step-by-step download guide
dataset.preservation_statement:
This data set is planned to be shared publicly alongside the public project github repository.
The data is shared from 2021-04-19 onward.
Sharing is performed via the github.com platform, until that hoster's strategic direction changes.
Until further notice, a web browser and internet connection to the western internet is required to access the public github repository. No authorization or registration is required for access.
The DOI of this data set was already acquired via the zenodo platform. However, due to technical limitations of the github/zenodo partnership, technical limitations of the `git` software, combined with the lock-in of the DOI system to institutionalized processes, the DOI for this data set actually points to a snapshot of the data which needs manual update each time the data set at the public project github repository is updated.

dataset.title: Gross Domestic Product of Austria, 1976 to 2019
dataset.description:
Economical data on the nominal gross domestic product of the country 'AUSTRIA' as calculated by the state-owned and state-sponsored entity 'STATISTIK AUSTRIA'.
The data points for various years have been collected from various places on https://statistik.at and merged into a single table by the contributor.

distribution.title: `sna-at-extracted` data set within the public project github repository
distribution.description:
Publishing of intermediate processing steps of the 2021-gdp-vs-ucdp project.
The distribution consists of a single `csv` file, which is also rendered into `pdf` form.

distribution.title: `sna-at-extracted` data set within the public project github repository
distribution.description:
Sharing of intermediate processing steps of the 2021-gdp-vs-ucdp project.
The distribution consists of a single `csv` file, which is also rendered into `pdf` form.

The data is shared from 2021-04-19 onward.
Sharing is performed via the github.com platform, until that hoster's strategic direction changes.
Until further notice, a web browser and internet connection to the western internet is required to access the public github repository. No authorization or registration is required for access.
The DOI of this data set was already acquired via the zenodo platform. However, due to technical limitations of the github/zenodo partnership, technical limitations of the `git` software, combined with the lock-in of the DOI system to institutionalized processes, the DOI for this data set actually points to a snapshot of the data which needs manual update each time the data set at the public project github repository is updated.

dataset.title: UCDP/PRIO Armed Conflict Dataset version 20.1
dataset.description: A conflict-year dataset with information on armed conflict where at least one party is the government of a state in the time period 1946-2019.

distribution.title: `ucdp` data set within the non-public project git repository
distribution.restriction_explanation: due to the missing license statement at the UCDP download page, permission to re-publish cannot be presumed.
distribution.description: Verbatim preservation of the originally downloaded files.

host.title: Pogner Family IT System
host.backup_type: rotating magnetic disks, on-site and off-site
host.storage_type: active checksum file system, on raid5, on rotating magnetic disks

data_quality_assurance: file naming convention: store files exactly as named by the data source
downloaded file content compared with expected sha256 checksum
dataset.preservation_statement:
This data set is planned to be barred from sharing, due to licensing concerns.
A DOI of this data set cannot be obtained without further institutional support, due to it's non-public nature.
Long-term availability of current, past and future versions of this data set is expected to be continuely provided by the UCDP itself.

dataset.title: Aggregated Extraction from the UCDP/PRIO dataset
dataset.description: Based on the UCDP/PRIO 20.1 dataset, the per-year cummulative world conflict level is calculated as the sum of all `intensity_level` values of all conflicts active in a particular year.

distribution.title: `ucdp-extracted` data set within the non-public project git repository
distribution.restriction_explanation: due to the missing license statement at the UCDP download page, permission to publish derivative works cannot be presumed.
distribution.description: Preservation of the intermediate data set, created during data processing within the 2021-gdp-vs-ucdp project.
